body_html:
I am currently building pip package locally (for the first time), [3148/3850] now, so it will probably work in my local build.

I am building from master branch, that is git checkout master rather than git checkout r1.5. Can you try that?

I am building without CUDA because my device dies not support it.

If I recalled it correctly, I have tried to build with -c opt before and it did not work.
body_text:

body:
I am currently building pip package locally (for the first time), [3148/3850] now, so it will probably work in my local build.

I am building from master branch, that is `git checkout master` rather than `git checkout r1.5`. Can you try that?

I am building without CUDA because my device dies not support it.

If I recalled it correctly, I have tried to build with `-c opt` before and it did not work.
